channel.title: How do you make admins on your server? please help asap!
channel.description: do you know because when i opened the note pad it was empty, and i added my name and compliled and didnt work, is there a code?

item.title: How do you make admins on your server? please help asap!
item.dc:creator: @superdude541 superdude541
item.description:
@superdude541 wrote:

kk If you wanna make other people admin/mods on your server simply go into your characters file and click on the username u want to make admin/mod. Once it’d open look for players right should be like 3 lines down.

I you wanna make a mod change Tyhe players rights to 1 if admin change to 2.

item.title: How do you make admins on your server? please help asap!
item.dc:creator: @BReV BReV
item.description:
@BReV wrote:

Here goes:

IN CLIENT.java
->Search for:

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

Below there is something like this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Admin")) { playerRights = 3; }

Then just change “Admin” to your nickname like:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("I SiS I")) { playerRights = 3; }

^Happy to help

Blades ReVolution
BReV
Oh i forgot to say:

-> Yes, every time you modify the server and you want it to make any changes YOU MUST COMPILE IT!

Read full topic
